narrative:
This inspection focused on the direct non-compliant items cited on the inspection dated 11-10-16.
The coatimundi, cow and Daisy the tiger have all received examination and evaluation by the attending veterinarian.
 Blood work results and a consultation with a veterinary expert for Daisy's condition are still pending.  The
coatimundi has been moved inside the warm room.  The shelters for the alpacas have bedding.
 No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility CEO and a board member.
Additional Inspectors
Bongard Carrie, Animal Care Inspector
